mapper.select: select * from board_news where postno = (select max(postno) from board_news)
mapper.update: update board_news set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writeDate = sysdate where postno = (select max(postno) from board_news)
update board_news set VIEWCOUNT = (select viewcount from board_news where postno = #{postNo})+1 where postno = #{postNo}
mapper.select: select postno, title, content, writer, writeDate, viewCount from ( select postno, seq, title, content, writer, writeDate, viewCount from ( select rownum as seq, postno, title, content, writer, writeDate, viewCount from ( select * from board_news order by postNo desc ) ) where seq >= #{startPoint} ) where rownum <= 10
